creator: nagendra.raja@tejasoft.com
text:
As Exec is a very generic task.. any output could convey the program which is 
beeing executed

e.g if the following is outcomes by executing a program adb.exe

[exec] invalid resource directory name: ./src/resources/generated

then if the output could be 

[exec-adb.exe] invalid resource directory name: ./src/resources/generated

Regards,
Raja Nagendra Kumar,
C.T.O
www.tejasoft.com

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Just set the 'taskname' attribute on exec.

<exec executable="abc.exe" taskname="exec-abc"/>

creator: nagendra.raja@tejasoft.com
text:
Thank you the issue is resolved..

However I don't see the attbute taskinfo in the manual..

manual\CoreTasks\exec.html...

may need fix for docs..
